etomica.modules.vle

Class DeviceThermoSliderGEMC

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.graphics.Device
      • etomica.modules.vle.DeviceThermoSliderGEMC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphicalElement, Dimensioned

    public class DeviceThermoSliderGEMC
extends Device
    Custom temperature slider for GEMC simulations. The only real difference is that this connects to the 2 sub-integrators (GEMC integrator is not an IntegratorBox).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class etomica.graphics.Device

        public void setIntegrators(IntegratorBox newIntegrator1,
                           IntegratorBox newIntegrator2)
        Sets the integrator for the device. Adds actions to the device's controller to inform the integrator when the temperature and isothermal/adiabatic selection has changed based upon the type of integrator passed in.
